DOC.brief_summary: A bio-equivalence of 2 different capsule formulations in fasted subjects
DOC.brief_title: Determine the Bioequivalence of Two Formulations of Tamsulosin HCl Capsules in Fasted Male.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male volunteers 18 years and older Exclusion criteria: History of hypersensitivity or allergy to the IPM or its excipients or any related medication
